at least.translation[0].definitions[0].d: not less than a particular number or amount
at least.translation[0].definitions[0].e: It will take you at least 20 minutes to get there.
He had at least £100,000 in savings.
It would cost $1 million at the very least.
at least.translation[0].definitions[1].d: even if something better is not true or is not done
at least.translation[0].definitions[1].e: At least he didn’t lie to me.
I don’t expect you to pay me, but you could at least cover my expenses.
The house still needed a lot of work, but at least the kitchen was finished.
at least.translation[0].definitions[2].d: used when you are correcting or changing something that you have just said
at least.translation[0].definitions[2].e: They all knew I was on their side. At least, that’s what they said.
I made everything perfectly clear – or at least I thought I did.
